titleStmt.title: A looking-glasse for the soule, and a definition thereof. Written by Edward Popham Gentleman
titleStmt.author: Popham, Edward, gentleman.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sold at the signe of the Star in Popes-head Alley, and vnder S. Peters Church in Corne-hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
